front.title: Using MSDP to create Logical RPs

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism to allow for an arbitrary number of RPs per group in a single share-tree PIM-SM domain. This memo is a product of the MBONE Deployment Working Group (MBONED) in the Operations and Management Area of the Internet Engineering Task Force. Submit comments to <mboned@ns.uoregon.edu> or the authors.
